Sadaf_Choudhry wrote:

> Can Junit tasks be scheduled? without using a Continuous Integration 
> tool like CruiseControl or anthill?

I don't see why not, as long as the operating system provides the 
scheduling feature. There's nothing about JUnit tests that makes them 
special this way.
